title: Doctor Who - Big Finish Podcast 03 - 02-20-2008
description:
Doctor Who - Big Finish Podcast 03 - 02-20-2008

Big Finish Podcast - Episode 3
(20/02/2008)
In this week&#039;s Big Finish Podcast, David Tennant and Noel Clarke talk to Nicholas Briggs about their work on Dalek Empire. Robert Ross, author of Assassin in the Limelight, goes through his top five Big Finish stories. Meanwhile Anna Hope, who played Novice Hame in Doctor Who, discusses her role in The Condemned. Also, Barnaby Edwards sifts through your e-mails in our regular Feedback section and we check out what our very own Creature From the Pit (aka web site wonder Paul Wilson) has been up to in the Big Finish basement.
